pkgmetadata.longdescription: R Bayesian Evidence Synthesis Tools // Tool-set to support Bayesian evidence synthesis. This includes meta-analysis, (robust) prior derivation from historical data, operating characteristics and analysis (1 and 2 sample cases). Please refer to Weber et al. (2021) doi:10.18637/jss.v100.i19 for details on applying this package while Neuenschwander et al. (2010) doi:10.1177/1740774509356002 and Schmidli et al. (2014) doi:10.1111/biom.12242 explain details on the methodology.
